channel.title: You search for a village to do your exam??
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "You search for a village to do your exam??"

item.title: You search for a village to do your exams in??
item.content:encoded: If you are looking for a village you can do your special-jonin or jonin exams in, I invite you all to come to Emonds Village. The only thing I request is that you stay at least for two days and that you help with the patrolling during this period. See you in Emonds Village
